    • Method Detail

      • putTile

        public boolean putTile(IntVector pos,
                       GridElement.ColorEnum col)
        Puts a new tile onto the grid at the position of pos. If pos is null, the command is ignored. If col is null, the position in the grid is set to null.
        Parameters:
        pos - coordinates to put the tile
        col - color of the tile
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • putTile

        public boolean putTile(IntVector pos,
                       Tile tile)
        Puts a new tile onto the grid at the position of pos. If tile is null, the designated position will be set to null
        Parameters:
        pos - position to put the tile
        tile - tile to be put on the grid
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getContiguousTiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<IntVector> getContiguousTiles(IntVector pos)
        Given an IntVector, returns a list contiguously colored tiles on the grid based on the tile at the position of the IntVector. if pos is null or out of bounds, an empty list is returned
        Parameters:
        pos - position of the tile shot by player
        Returns:
        list of IntVectors representing position of each color-contiguous tile. Empty if pos is invalid

      • changeTileColor

        public boolean changeTileColor(IntVector pos,
                               GridElement.ColorEnum col)
        Change the Color of the tile located on IntVector. If pos is null or out of bounds, or if there is no tile at the position, the operation is ignored of the ColorEnum is null, the operation is also ignored
        Parameters:
        pos - the position to change the tile color
        Returns:
        true if the tile at the position changed its color

      • connectAllTiles

        public void connectAllTiles()
        updates connector status for all tiles

      • connectTile

        public void connectTile(int x,
                        int y)
        Update connectors for a tile at a given position as well as all adjacent tiles. This allows updating a single tile without hitting the whole grid.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of Tile for connector update
        y - y coordinate of Tile for connector update

      • getRandomExistingColor

        public GridElement.ColorEnum getRandomExistingColor()
        get a ColorEnum of a Tile that is currently on the tileGrid
        Returns:
        color of an existing tile, random if the grid is empty

      • getShortestPath

        public java.util.LinkedList<IntVector> getShortestPath(IntVector start,
                                                       IntVector end)
        Finds the shortest path between two indexes on the following rules: travelling across an occupied space takes 1 move travelling across an unoccupied space (null) takes 2 moves
        Parameters:
        start - index to start
        end - index to finish
        Returns:
        Linked List of IntVectors with the shortest path taken. The first IntVector is the start location. The last IntVector is the end location. null indexes are listed twice since it takes 2 turns to travel through them
